Package primitives

Class Point

java.lang.Object
primitives.Point
Direct Known Subclasses:
Vector
public class Point extends Object
Point class allows us to represent a point with coordinates x,y,z.
Author:
Mendy Welner 209272228. mendiwell@gmail.com Mendy Segal. 211769955.Mendysegal490@gmail.com
